unnormalised: Tor, konnem tori vicharlem ki Bharotant online xikop khorench faideak poddta? Ekleak zannem chodd vell aplea laptop screen-acher chaii-ye poros chodd vell dhyan dila, mhaka tumkam *gyaan* divonk diiat.
normalised: So, konnem tor eklo vicharlem ki online learning khorench Bharotant faideachem asa? Ekea monxan jinnem chah peksha laptop-achea screen-cher odik vell dhyan dilem, taka tumi *gyaan* gheiat.

unnormalised: Poilem, ami khorem sangunk zai. Tem disaank yaad kara IIT-JEE ani CAT poriksheank 200 her vidhyarthyank tandoor-an poros unhast zalelya class-room-an bhorun bosun zannem tumi abhyas kela? Haa, online xikop tumkam tem evitaunk dita. Ani, tumi pajaama-ant lekhcharank bhag ghevonk zatat! Tem tumchea sthanik coaching kendrant korun pollouia! Hanvem lungi ghalun lekhcharank bhag gheunk poddla chodd pautim hanvem manun ghetlean (camera bond, narach!).
normalised: Poilem, satya sangouche zata. Tem dis yaad kara je tumni I-I-T-J-E-E ani C-A-T porixa khatir don xem vidhyarthyanchi bhirddant, tandoor peksha ushnea class-room-ant bosun ratri ratri poriant abhyas kelo? Online learning tuka tem tallunk dita. Ani tumi pajama ghalunui lecture-ak vochunk xakhta! Tem korunk tumchea thanchea coaching center-ant prayatn korunk zai! Hanvem camera bond korun lungi ghalun odik lecture attend keleat kiteak hanv te sangonk sangonam!

unnormalised: Aata, bori vastu. EdTech companyam kursaam amche voir uloitat jevonn divlli ani te *mithai* ditaat mhonn. Tumi coding xikunk zatat (Python, Java, tumi sangonk zatat!), data science, ani sitar-an kheleupak online-an! Gambhirponnan, hanvem ₹499-ak ek kurs pollela dusrea disak. Vhodd pizza poros kharchikaai! (Pun TBH, mhaka pizza chodd zai).
normalised: Atam bori vostu sangta. E-D-Tech company-yo amche voir course fekta jassen ti Diwali ani te *mithai* vanttat. Tumi coding (Python, Java, tumi sangata tem!), data science, ani sitar kiteak vazounk zata online xikonk xakta! Khorench, hanvem rupe charchar xem novad navanchem ek course ailem te dis. Eke mottea pizza peksha unnem! (Torui, T-B-H, maka pizza zai asa).

unnormalised: Pun sambhall, tem sogllim ranganchi kavollam ani unocorn na. Internet zoddni azun durbol Bharotaant zaitea bhaganim. Ek khasa online class-achea modhyaant astanam kalpoun gheiat, ani BAM! Power cut. Tem mhaka zaitea pautim ghoddla zaitem hanv sankhiyet korunk zata. Mhojem ghorche azun "Internet gelem!" bolyek jevnnachya ghanttek lekhtat.
normalised: Pun thamb, hem sogllem rangit ani unicorn na. Internet-achi jodni Bharotant choddxea bhaganim ajun favo te bhaxen na. Vichar kara tumi ek mahatvachea online class-achea madheant asat, ani B-A-M! Light geli. Tem maka annek pavtim ghoddlam jitle pavtim hanv sangonam. Mhojem kutumb atam "Internet gellam!" hem sandhkallichi ghanti jiuntrat.

unnormalised: Ani thoim "dhyan" samasya asa. Tem soklea zoddunk soklem asa. Ek minute tumi machine learning vixim xikunk asa, dusrea minute tumi billanche video YouTube-an pollounc asa. Ani, tumchi maaim modhya-ant yetlo "Beta, chai pi lo!" dor 15 minuteak. Tem aashirvad ani abhyas, khorem sangunk.
normalised: Ani magir "dhyan" eka problem asa. Dhyan bhonvonk khub sulabh asa. Ek minut tumi machine learning xiktat, ani dusrea minutant tumi YouTube-cher mevkuleanche video pollounk lagtat. Ani tumchi mai tumchea lagim yetat "Beta, chai pi lo!" dor pondra minutanim. Tem ek ashirvad ani ek shap asa, khorench.

unnormalised: Mhaka disshta, ami manun gheuia. Tumi khorench same networking sandhi mellounc zatat kiteak tumi IIM Ahmedabad-an astat jevonn tumi online MBA korunk asta? Sambhav na. Thoddeo vostuo, jevonn te ajeb-ast group project ani networking karyakram, traditional anubhavacho bhag asa.
normalised: Mhozo arth sangchea khatir, tumi khorench teo networking sandhi mellounk xaktat ji tumi I-I-M Ahmedabad-ant online M-B-A korun mellounk xaktat? Sodanch na. Kiteak tor kahi vostu, joxem te avghad group project ani networking event, te parmparik anubhavacho bhag asat.

unnormalised: Pun poll, online xikop *asa* sope. Tem tumkam kursam zai tevenchi sandhi diita tumkam zai zaiti ani tumi her thara korunk nashi thara. Tumi tumchea aaple tharan xikunk zatat, lekhcheraam firlouia (devaache dhanyavad!), ani traffic jaamak evitaria. Mull value chodd bore asa. Tem sovem upskill korunk bore asa. Companyo chodd zai zaiti AI/ML hunar setaak, ani thoim bore marg nakhai class gheunk 10 PM te 1 AM poren.
normalised: Pun pollai, online learning *sooiaskarta*. Tem tumka course mellounk dita je tumka dusrea zagea voir na. Tumi tumchea ritin xikonk xaktat, lecture pattlean korun polleunk xaktat (Deva dhanyavad!), ani traffic jam tallunk zata. Tem faideachem asa khorench. Ani tem tumchi dakshata vaddounk ek borem marg asa. Company-yo atam A-I slash M-L कौशल्य zai mhonta, ani te khatir odik borem marg na kon tor tumi pondra P-M te ek A-M class gheun.

unnormalised: Tor, tem faideak poddta? Tumchea voir avalambun asa, bhai. Tumi anushasanik asat, swa- prerit, ani ek bori internet zoddni asa, tor gambhirponnan! Fakt yaad dovorta video calls-achea velar pant ghalunk (svatha anubhavo sangta...). Tum legit certifications-ank dhyan divunk; thoddi dodgy providers asa thoim. Vostuonchi check korunk jevonn ISO 9001 certifications, va bore kiteamcheam 4 Firm-e kurs/certification-ak vollokh dita. Ani shishtaachya karnak, notification-ank bond kara tum class-an bhag gheunk astaana! Tum zatole!
normalised: Tor, tem faideachem asa? Tumcher adharita, bhai. Tum disciplined, svatah prerit ani tumcho internet-achi jodni bori asa, pun khorench! Pun video call-ache vellar pant ghalunk yaad dovrat (hanv anubhavan sangta...). Ani dhyan divrat borya certificate-achea voir; kiteak tor thode khotte mellouche providor asa. I-S-O nav xem ek certificate aslem mhunn polleat, va odik borem sangouche zata tor Big Four company te course slash certificate vollokhunk zai. Ani devache khatir notification bond karat tumi class attend kortana! Tumko mellta!
